name: You Belong With Me
lyrics:
You Belong With Me - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
   
Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/Liz Rose
   
Composed by：Taylor Swift/Liz Rose
   
You're on the phone with your girlfriend
你在电话里与你的女朋友谈心 
She's upset
她心烦意乱 
She's going off about something that you said
她不想听你说的那些事
'Cause she doesn't get your humor like I do
她不像我那样懂得你的幽默 
I'm in the room
我在房间里
It's a typical Tuesday night
那是一个很平常的周二晚上
I'm listening to the kind of music she doesn't like
我正在听着她不喜欢的音乐 
And she'll never know your story like I do
她永远不会像我一样知道你的故事 
But she wears short skirts
但她穿短裙
I wear T-shirts
我穿T恤 
She's cheer captain
她是啦啦队队长
And I'm on the bleachers
而我是露台上的看客
Dreaming about the day when you wake up
梦想着这一天，当你醒来
And find that what you're looking for has been here the whole time
你会发现你一直在找的东西就在你身边 
If you could see that I'm the one who understands you
你应该能看到我是唯一能理解你的人 
Been here all along so why can't you see
一直在你左右 你为什么看不见呢 
You belong with me
我们在一起才合适
You belong with me
我们在一起才合适
Walkin' the streets with you and your worn-out jeans
你穿着破旧的牛仔裤和我走在街上
I can't help thinking this is how it ought to be
我情不自禁地想它怎么可以这样
Laughing on a park bench thinking to myself
我坐在公园的长椅上因为自己而大笑 
Hey isn't this easy
这不是很容易吗 
And you've got a smile that could light up this whole town
你笑了，那微笑可以照亮整个世界
I haven't seen it in a while since she brought you down
我好长时间都没有再见过那样的笑容了，自从她令你情绪失落
You say you're fine
你说你很好 
I know you better than that
我知道你应该比这更好的
Hey what cha doing with a girl like that
对于那样的女生你会怎样 
She wears high heels
她穿着高跟鞋 
I wear sneakers
我穿着运动鞋
She's cheer captain and I'm on the bleachers
她是啦啦队队长 而我是露台上的看客
Dreaming about the day when you wake up
梦想着有一天，当你醒来你会发现
And find that what you're looking for has been here the whole time
你一直在找的东西就在你身边
If you could see that I'm the one who understands you
你应该能看到我是唯一能理解你的人
Been here all along so why can't you see
一直在你左右 你为什么看不见呢 
You belong with me
我们在一起才合适
Standing by and waiting at your back door
我在你家后门等你
All this time how could you not know
亲爱的 这么长时间了你怎么可能不知道呢
Baby you belong with me
亲爱的 我们在一起才合适
You belong with me
我们在一起才合适
Oh I remember you drivin' to my house in the middle of the night
我记得，你半夜开车去我家
I'm the one who makes you laugh
我是唯一能让你笑的人
When you know you're about to cry
当你知道自己要哭的时候
And I know your favorite songs
我知道你最喜欢听什么歌
And you tell me about your dreams
你告诉过我你的梦想
Think I know where you belong
我想我知道你属于哪里
Think I know it's with me
我认为你应该和我在一起 
Can't you see that I'm the one who understands you
你应该能看到我是唯一能理解你的人
Been here all along so why can't you see
一直在你左右 你为什么看不见呢 
You belong with me
我们在一起才合适
Standing by and waiting at your back door
我在你家后门等你
All this time
亲爱的 这么长时间了
How could you not know
你怎么可能不知道呢
Baby you belong with me
亲爱的 我们在一起才合适
You belong with me
我们在一起才合适
You belong with me
我们在一起才合适
Have you ever thought just maybe
你有没有想过这种可能呢
You belong with me
我们在一起才合适
You belong with me
我们在一起才合适

comments.content: [喜欢][喜欢][喜欢][喜欢][喜欢][大爱][大爱][大爱][大爱][拜托][拜托][拜托][拜托][拜托][拜托][棒][棒][棒][棒][棒][棒][棒][棒][棒][嘴唇][鲜花][鲜花][鲜花][黄钻]
